doc.name: OptimizingSDFDirector
doc.description:
Director for the synchronous dataflow (SDF) model of computation which finds an optimized schedule according to a defined criterion.

Class comments

An OptimizingSDFDirector is the class that controls execution of actors under the SDF domain, while using an optimal schedule. For this it uses the OptimizingSDFScheduler class.

See ptolemy.domains.sdf.kernel.SDFDirector, ptolemy.domains.sdf.kernel.SDFScheduler and ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.OptimizingSDFScheduler for more information.

The optimizationCriterion parameter of this director selects the optimization criterion.
